info.title: Issue Tracker API
info.description: API for describing various endpoints of issue tracker

get.summary: Get a list of all project activities

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The numeric Id of the issue

email.errorMessage: "email" is not allowed to be empty and should be valid

password.errorMessage: "password" must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, one special character (@#$%^&+=!), and must be at least 8 characters long with no spaces.

200.description: accessToken and refreshTokens are successfully generated.

Set-Cookie.description: The cookie with accessToken and refreshToken

400.description: The request contains invalid body paramaters

/auth/identity/refresh-tokens.description: If refresh token is valid, generate new access and refresh tokens

post.description: If refresh token is valud, generates new tokens

200.description: new accessToken token is successfully created

Set-Cookie.description: The cookie with accessToken and refreshToken

400.description: BadRequest, the provided token was not in correct format

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected server error occured

/auth/identity/revoke-tokens.description: Revokes the token from cookie and database

post.description: Removes the access tokens and refresh tokens

401.description: Unauthorized - The user is not authenticated

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected server error occured
